abstract: The search for wisdom in personal finance will take you to John C. Bogle, who still preaches the gospel of long-term, low-cost, diversified investing.
snippet: The search for wisdom in personal finance will take you to John C. Bogle, who still preaches the gospel of long-term, low-cost, diversified investing.
lead_paragraph: THE search for wisdom in personal finance will take you sooner or later to John C. Bogle, who founded Vanguard, created the first index mutual fund and still preaches the gospel of long-term, low-cost, diversified investing.

headline.main: Extolling the Value of the Long View
headline.print_headline: Extolling The Value Of the Long View
